title: I can't transfer file to pixel 5 from window7 , window detect the device but No drive appears
content:
I connect my phone to window 10 it works but it doesn't work on my windows 7, all my android phones work well with windows 7 expect pixel 5, I reset my phone and pc, tried different usb ports, so far no result , 
Windows7 detect my divce but no drive or storage appears on the system so I can transfer my files,
